nodes.title: Office Hours Temptation
nodes.story: Dr. van der Merwe, 32, your Political Science lecturer, leans over your essay. 'Brilliant analysis,' he murmurs, hand brushing yours. 'My wife doesn't understand my work.' His cologne is expensive. The door is closed. 'Join me for coffee? Off campus?'

choices.text: Meet at Vida e Caff√® in Rosebank

nodes.title: The First Hotel
nodes.story: At the Saxon Hotel, he pays cash. 'My treat.' Champagne in the room. 'You're extraordinary,' he whispers, unbuttoning your shirt. His wedding ring glints. You notice pregnancy stretch marks on his stomach he didn't mention. His phone buzzes: 'Wife' calling.

choices.text: Stop and ask about his family

nodes.title: Semester of Secrets
nodes.story: You get an A+ in his module. Classmates whisper. You meet weekly at guesthouses. He buys you a laptop, pays your rent. 'It's love,' he says. His wife tags him in family photos: two toddlers. You're pregnant. The test is positive in the campus bathroom.

nodes.title: The Ultimatum
nodes.story: He panics. 'Terminate. I'll pay.' Hands you R5000 cash. 'We can't continue.' You threaten to expose him. He threatens to fail you in all subjects. Blackmail negotiation over WhatsApp. Your friend finds the chats, leaks them to the SRC.

nodes.title: Campus Scandal
nodes.story: News24 picks up the story: 'WITS LECTURER IMPREGNATES STUDENT.' You're doxxed online. His wife sues you for 'homewrecking.' The university offers you a settlement to leave quietly. Your face is on Twitter with clown emojis. The baby is due in exam season.

choices.endingText: You raise the child in a different province. The lecturer is fired but gets another job overseas. Your child asks about their father. You show them the news articles.
